data.name: 0000 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That reminds me of something Koizumi said.

data.name: 0001 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That he doesn't want you getting fussy over little things.

data.name: 0002 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Little things? What do you mean?

data.name: 0003 (207.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: There's no way I can just tell her Koizumi's theory about her, but…

data.name: 0004 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: To sum it up--

data.name: 0005 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: As brigade chief--as our leader--he wants you to see the bigger picture of things.

data.name: 0006 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hasn't he got a point?

data.name: 0007 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …I don't really remember fussing over any little things that much though...

data.name: 0008 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: It's just an example.

data.name: 0009 (207.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't use your unfair power that can do any- thing over trivial matters--is what he means.

data.name: 0010 (207.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's not about what you say, but how you say it. Isn't that right, Koizumi?

data.name: 0011 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm not sure if I get it or not...

data.name: 0012 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Does he want me to act big?

data.name: 0013 (207.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: No, it's not that abstract…

data.name: 0014 (207.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: W-well, something like that.

data.name: 0015 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm... Well, I'm not the sort of person to be fussy in the first place.

data.name: 0016 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'll strive to keep it that way--as a leader to my brigade members.

data.name: 0017 (207.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …I feel like it's not exactly getting through to her, but whatever.

data.name: 0018 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Koizumi said that you have a very grand manner of thinking.

data.name: 0019 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I have a grand manner of thinking?

data.name: 0020 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: He said you aren't fussy about trivial things --a trait common amongst leaders.

data.name: 0021 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, I suppose so. I'm definitely not fussy, but…

data.name: 0022 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Apparently that's really important for getting people to follow you.

data.name: 0023 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I feel like I'm not really getting it…

data.name: 0024 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Is it like--people who stand at the top are big dreamers? That kind of thing?

data.name: 0025 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I'm not sure in that regard.

data.name: 0026 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Hmm... Well, whatever. It doesn't seem totally off the mark or anything.

data.name: 0027 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Isn't he basically telling me to keep be firmly composed--being the SOS Brigade chief?

data.name: 0028 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I think you're right.

data.name: 0029 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06…Also so you don't use your power over insignificant things.

data.name: 0030 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru--Did you just say something?

data.name: 0031 (207.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no--nothing.

data.name: 0032 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The leader of an organization should not fuss over trivial matters.

data.name: 0033 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Wh-what's this all of a sudden?

data.name: 0034 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Itsuki Koizumi said so.

data.name: 0035 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi did?

data.name: 0036 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I don't fuss over trivial things though?

data.name: 0037 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: You don't.

data.name: 0038 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That's why you are suitable as a leader.

data.name: 0039 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: So Koizumi was praising me?

data.name: 0040 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It can be interpreted like that.

data.name: 0041 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ohh--You should've been more upfront about it from the start then.

data.name: 0043 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: #P06If trivial actualizations cause a chain reaction, everything will collapse.

data.name: 0044 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Huh, what? What will collapse?

data.name: 0045 (207.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Talking to myself.

data.name: 0046 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah, Yuki! Don't go off ahead without me!

data.name: 0047 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's something I often wonder about.

data.name: 0048 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You're not the type to fuss over small things --you take a broad perspective of matters.

data.name: 0049 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: …What's this about all of a sudden?

data.name: 0050 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well since the SOS Brigade is an organization at this point, I think about various things.

data.name: 0051 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If you were the type to fuss over trivial matters, it'd create an oppressive atmosphere.

data.name: 0052 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: However, since you're instead rather broad-minded, I believe you're...

data.name: 0053 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: ...managing the SOS Brigade rather excellently.

data.name: 0054 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Well, you're right that I'm not making a fuss over trivial matters…

data.name: 0055 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It's a critical factor. It's an essential skill for those who lead organizations.

data.name: 0056 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Please continue to lead us with your daring ambitions.

data.name: 0057 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I'm not sure I get it, but you want me to be a firm and collected leader, right?

data.name: 0058 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is indeed the case.

data.name: 0059 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: #P06…I just wish for you not to brandish that power over trivial matters.

data.name: 0060 (207.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you say something?

data.name: 0061 (207.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: No, nothing.
